entity.name: account
entity.sql: SELECT * from (select account.* from accountcrmuser\,account where (accountcrmuser.crmuserId=?) AND accountcrmuser.accountId=account.id order by whenadded DESC) as aAccount
entity.sql-admin: SELECT * from (select account.* from account where (? IS NOT NULL) order by whenadded DESC) as aAccount
entity.sql-ent: SELECT * from (select account.* from account where account.id=? order by whenadded DESC) as aAccount

entity.name: contact
entity.sql: select * from (select contact.*\,account.name as an\,account.id as accountName from contact\,contactcrmuser\,account where contactcrmuser.crmuserId=? AND contactcrmuser.contactId=contact.id AND account.id=contact.accountId order by whenadded DESC) as aContact
entity.sql-admin: select * from (select contact.*\,account.name as an\,account.id as accountName from contact\,account where account.id=contact.accountId AND (? IS NOT NULL) order by whenadded DESC) as aContact
entity.sql-ent: select * from (select contact.*\,account.id as accountName from contact\,account where contact.id=? AND account.id=contact.accountId order by whenadded DESC) as aContact

entity.name: coach
entity.sql: select * from crmuser where ? is NOT NULL limit 10
entity.sql-ent: select * from crmuser where ? is NOT NULL limit 10

entity.name: crmuser
entity.sql: select * from crmuser where ? is NOT NULL
entity.sql-admin: select * from crmuser where ? is NOT NULL

entity.name: activity
entity.sql: select * from (select activity.*\,activity.activity_type as act_type\,activity.status as act_status\, activity.contactId as contactName\, contact.accountId as accountName from activity\, contact\,activitycrmuser where contact.id= activity.contactId AND activitycrmuser.activityId=activity.id AND activitycrmuser.crmuserId=?) as aActivity
entity.sql-admin: select * from (select activity.*\,activity.activity_type as act_type\,activity.status as act_status\, activity.contactId as contactName\, contact.accountId as accountName from activity\, contact where contact.id= activity.contactId AND (? IS NOT NULL)) as aActivity
entity.sql-ent: select * from (select activity.*\,activity.activity_type as act_type\,activity.status as act_status\, activity.contactId as contactName\, contact.accountId as accountName\, contact.name as cn from activity\, contact\,activitycrmuser where contact.id= activity.contactId AND activity.id=? AND activitycrmuser.activityId=activity.id) as aActivity

entity.name: externalMeeting
entity.sql: select * from (select *\,activity_type as act_type\,status as act_status from externalMeeting where crmuserId=?) as aMeeting
entity.sql-admin: select * from (select *\,activity_type as act_type\,status as act_status from externalMeeting where crmuserId=?) as aMeeting
entity.sql-ent: select * from (select *\,activity_type as act_type\,status as act_status from externalMeeting where externalMeeting.id=?) as aMeeting

entity.name: dealerAccount
entity.sql: SELECT dealerAccount.* FROM dealerAccount where ? IS NOT NULL
entity.sql-admin: SELECT dealerAccount.* FROM dealerAccount where ? IS NOT NULL

entity.name: dealerContact
entity.sql: select * from dealerContact where ? IS NOT NULL
entity.sql-admin: select * from dealerContact where ? IS NOT NULL
